text: It's been 10 years since Heath Ledger died of an accidental drug overdose. Since Ledger's passing, life has not been the same for his former girlfriend Michelle Williams, who's the mother to his 12 - year - old daughter, Matilda. ` ` It just won't ever be right,'' Williams has said of raising their daughter alone. But when the milestone anniversary of Ledger's death rolled around, Williams'close friend Busy Philipps did her best to comfort her grieving pal, flying to San Francisco to be by her side.
